KISPE Bremen Open Enrolment Course

16 November 2025 – 17 November 2025

KISPE Space Courtyard Marriott, Theodor-Heuss-Allee 2, 28215 Bremen, Germany

KISPE are hosting an open enrolment course prior to Space Tech Expo Europe, aimed at those looking to increase their knowledge and understanding on what it takes to design and manufacture subsystems and equipment for use in space. The course draws on the extensive practical first-hand experience the team have gained over more than thirty years of designing, building, testing, launching and operating space systems. The course begins with an overview of the space environment, subsystem design and manufacture, space systems architecture, materials and part selection, component deratings, interface definitions and standards, and common design pitfalls. A networking event is planned for the evening of the first day.

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
